revised_title: Nonlinear Theory of Wave Propagation in Dispersive Systems
tldr: This discussion meeting focuses on summarizing and consolidating the knowledge of wave mechanics, specifically in the area of nonlinear theory of wave propagation in dispersive systems. The meeting explores various methods of calculation and the range of their applicability, as well as the interrelationships between different theories and the gaps in our knowledge. The meeting aims to encourage discussion and identify potential areas for future research.
